name: untappd_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries on Untappd in parallel.

detailSteps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('.beer-item, .results-container .beer, [class*="beer-result"]').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 15) { const nameEl = el.querySelector('.name a, .beer-name a, h3 a'); const breweryEl = el.querySelector('.brewery a, .beer-brewery a'); const ratingEl = el.querySelector('.rating, .num, [class*="rating"]'); const styleEl = el.querySelector('.style, .beer-style'); results.push({ name: nameEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', url: nameEl?.href || '', brewery: breweryEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', rating: ratingEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', style: styleEl?.textContent?.trim() || '' }); } }); const query = new URL(window.location.href).searchParams.get('q') || ''; return { query, result_count: results.length, results };
detailSteps.name: results
detailSteps.label: Extract
